mapper.select: select count(1) from t_tenant t1 LEFT JOIN t_zhuke t2 on t1.houseid=t2.id
select t2.name,t2.fhao,t1.starttime,t1.endtime,t1.status,t1.url from t_tenant t1 LEFT JOIN t_zhuke t2 on t1.houseid=t2.id LIMIT #{start},#{rows}
select count(1) from t_tenant t1 LEFT JOIN t_zhuke t2 on t1.houseid=t2.id
select t1.name,t1.starttime,t1.endtime,t1.status,t1.url from t_tenant t1 LEFT JOIN t_zhuke t2 on t1.houseid=t2.id LIMIT #{start},#{rows}
